data.text:
Russell, Eric Frank. THREE TO CONQUER. London: Dennis Dobson, [1957]. Octavo, cloth. First British hardcover edition. "A telepath 'hears' a dying scream from a car -- and becomes the only human to realize that intelligent viruses from Venus have taken over the bodies of three astronauts. Slick entertainment written in private-eye style." - Pringle, The Ultimate Guide to Science Fiction, second edition (1995), p. 372. Clarke, Tale of the Future (1978), p. 111. A fine copy in fine dust jacket with touch of rubbing to spine ends. This edition is much scarcer than the American edition. (#146357).

Price: $150.00
